## About me


This is Jinjie Duan. I am a bioinformatician at Department of Biomedicine, Aarhus University, Aarhus, Denmark. My current research interests are,

* the effect of rare genetic variants on human mental disorders, e.g. ADHD, autism and schizophrenia

* the prediction of human mental disorders by combining genetic common and rare variants together with registry data.
